*div1 type="summary"* *p* Affidavit concerning forgery*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Territory of Arkansas*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*County of Miller*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-22-1825">This day*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Clark Robinson*/person_mentioned* being duly sworn before me *person_mentioned*John H. Fowler an acting justice of the Peace in and for *location_mentioned*Miller County*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, Territory afsd. sayeth that *person_mentioned*Ruben McHaws*/person_mentioned* purchased early in this month a quantity of Merchandeze and endorse[d] notes to said *person_mentioned*Fowler*/person_mentioned* for the same to the Amount of about two hundred and forty one dollars and twenty five cents which notes has every appearance of being Forged and said deponent verrilly believes that they are forged notes and it appears to be a general opinion that the notes are spurious*/p*
*p*Great exersions were made use of to get hold of *person_mentioned*McHaws*/person_mentioned* who with dexterity made his escape*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Clark Robinson*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Sworn and subscribed before me *date_mentioned n="09-22-1825">22nd Sept 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J H Fowler Jr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The above affidavit taken before me would not be valed in law but is designed to shew you that [M]y claim does exist and every necessary proof can be had to prove my statements true.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John F. Fowler*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
